messages.text:
I need to develop a test framework for some control software that will:
1. use reactive programming
2. use a predetermined schedule
3. be deterministic and repeatable for a given schedule
4. allow for data to be intercepted so that they can be "corrupted" according to the test schedule: i.e. some values zeroed out or turned missing, noise added, delayed
I think I can do all of these things with Rocket.jl. Can anyone see any issues or have any experience with this kind of thing?
